title.narrative: Multitranche Financing Facility (MFF) - Rajasthan Urban Sector Development Investment Program (Tranche 1)

description.narrative: To increase economic growth, reduce poverty and sustain improvement in the urban environment and quality of life in the Jaisalmer, Alwar and Jhalawar/Jhalarapatan. The expected outcome of the Tranche 1 will be increased access to sustainable urban infrastructure and services for people in the Project ULBs, and improved capacities of, and sustainable management of urban services by the Project ULBs.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved access to urban infrastructure and services of three ULBs to manage urban services

title.narrative: All ULBs with a population density of 150 households/hectare and water supply of 135 lpcd provided with sewerage facilities including STPs.
